text: Ashley Phillip Adams (12 October 1955 â€“ 17 March 2015) was an Australian Paralympic shooting medallist and cattle grazier. Adams died on 17 March 2015 after a quad bike accident on his farm in Blackall, Queensland. He was 59. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1955 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Sport shooters Category:Accidental deaths Category:Sportspeople from Queensland
